attributes.action: Partially refund tuition fees for students learning during the covid crisis
attributes.additional_details: Many students working through this crisis have no in person teaching time however are paying the same price as a normal year , the online learning format disadvantages students who cannot afford a decent laptop or technology to make this learning format easier . University students are being forgotten during this pandemic despite the amount they’re paying for a good education .
attributes.background: Put measures into place which mean universities partially refund tuition fees to people studying through the Covid crisis OR provide free laptops and equipment to enhance online learning
